@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Representation of a form. A form widget can contain one or more {@link Row} widgets. Example Here is an example of how to use the widget. 

   var title = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Title("Group");
   var form = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Form();
   form.add(new qx.ui.mobile.form.TextField(), "Username: ");
   this.getRoot().add(title);
   this.getRoot().add(new qx.ui.mobile.form.renderer.Single(form));

This example creates a form and adds a row with a text field in it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: the renderer this form uses to be displayed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Validates the form using the {@link qx.ui.form.validation.Manager#validate} method.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Makes a row visible, identified by its group and row index.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: groupIndex {Integer} the index of the group to which the row belongs to
@param.description: the index of the group to which the row belongs to

@param.name: @param
@param.body: rowIndex {Integer} the index of the row inside the target group
@param.description: the index of the row inside the target group

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Makes a row invisible, identified by its group and row index.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: groupIndex {Integer} the index of the group to which the row belongs to
@param.description: the index of the group to which the row belongs to

@param.name: @param
@param.body: rowIndex {Integer} the index of the row inside the target group
@param.description: the index of the row inside the target group

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the item with the given group and rowIndex.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: groupIndex {Integer} the index of the group to which the row belongs to
@param.description: the index of the group to which the row belongs to

@param.name: @param
@param.body: rowIndex {Integer} the index of the row inside the target group
@param.description: the index of the row inside the target group

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the invalid items of the form, which were determined by {@link qx.ui.mobile.form.Form#validate} before. It returns an empty array if no items are invalid.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget[]} The invalid items of the form.
@return.description: The invalid items of the form.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
